``do``
======

The ``do`` tag works exactly like the regular variable expression (``{{ ...
}}``) just that it doesn't print anything:

.. code-block:: twig

    {% do 1 + 2 %}
=======

}}``) just that it doesn't print anything:

.. code-block:: twig

    {% do 1 + 2 %}
